name: Monkei Clicker
description:
Welcome to Monkei Clicker, the addictive and fun clicker game where you can become the ultimate monkei master!

In this game, your goal is to click the monkei as much as possible by clicking on the screen.  When you click a monkei they will drop a banana which is then used to buy upgrades. 

So what are you waiting for? Start clicking and collecting monkeys today in Monkei Clicker, the ultimate clicker game for monkey fans everywhere!

Please note that all the in-game images, such as the zookeeper and the monkey that you click on, are currently part of a prototype and subject to change. We appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to improve the game and deliver the best possible experience to our players.
